alert.note: Alert for Bakersfield; Kern River Valley; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 12:14PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Kern and southern Tulare Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1213 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bakersfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bakersfield, Glennville and Oildale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bakersfield; Kern River Valley; South End Sierra Foothills; South End of the Lower Sierra; South End of the Upper Sierra; Southeast San Joaquin Valley
